name: Bullet Farmer - Carrot Cannon
description:
"Bullet Farmer - Carrot Cannon" is a submission to the "Bullet Hell Jam - 2022".

Your Farm is overrun with pests and you need to defend it.
you can collect more carrots and radishes from the fields too keep shooting.
But watch out: dont trample your fields while theyre still growing!

I couold not make use of the full 10 days, since i was working. but i still like what we have produced.
we have many more ideas to improve on this prototype and hope to do exactly that.

I did this with mainly one friend and my brother helped out with the TitleScreen.
